game.name: Working Class Monsters
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Heroes destroyed your kingdom. Your monsters need jobs. Draft workers from card packs, place them strategically, watch your economy grow. Unlock powerful upgrades and expand your territory. A casual incremental journey with a definite ending.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Heroes destroyed your kingdom. Your monsters need jobs. Draft workers from card packs, place them strategically, watch your economy grow. Unlock powerful upgrades and expand your territory. A casual incremental journey with a definite ending.
